content.raw:
I've gotten an intermittent seg-fault two times when clicking the record button in a certain sequence, though it doesn't always happen. I have one backtrace.

1. open gazebo
2. insert double pendulum model, watch it swing
3. pause simulation
4. reset world
5. step once to show the pendulum back at its initial position
6. click record

Here's a [backtrace showing the output after I clicked record](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96660379/video-encoding-sef-fault-backtrace.txt), and I also have a [backtrace for all threads](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96660379/video-encoding-sef-fault-backtrace-all-threads.txt).

I've gotten an intermittent seg-fault two times when clicking the record button in a certain sequence, though it doesn't always happen. I have one backtrace.

  1. open gazebo
  2. insert double pendulum model, watch it swing
  3. pause simulation
  4. reset world
  5. step once to show the pendulum back at its initial position
  6. click record
